There is no obstacle that cannot be overcome if the nation forges unity in its ranks & has the determination to succeed against odds. Quaid-i-Azam's motto of "work, work & work " is a beacon light for the nation to galvanize itself in the pursuit of self-reliance & bright future.

The big hike in energy bills from today shows us we are short of electricity and gas. The government needs to take more urgent action to increase domestic supply and end our dangerous and expensive reliance on imports.

For those misinterpreting my remark, it has always been my conviction that true independence comes from self-reliance. The concept of sovereignty is incomplete without economic sovereignty, which cannot be achievd without 'blood, sweat and tears'. https://t.co/mEekko1tCP
The over-reliance on Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan is there for all to see, as the so-called finishers in the middle-order are doing nothing most of the time #PAKvAUS #Cricket

The Conservatives have had 12 years to end the UK’s reliance on imported fossil fuels. 
 
They chose not to. 
 
Labour is on your side. We would introduce cheap, clean, British renewables and nuclear energy. https://t.co/o2CYcCO85M

Our country's reliance on fossil fuels empowers dictators like Putin. I stand with a broad coalition of groups calling for action to get our economy off of fossil fuels and double down on clean energy investments. The time to act is now. https://t.co/xSpMxeSqH3

Electric vehicles will decrease our reliance on fossil fuels, but it will massively increase our reliance on China! 

Hunter Biden has helped the Chinese buy cobalt mines to make electric batteries, while @JoeBiden pushes us toward electric cars. 🤔🤔🤔

"They'll make up any old cobblers..."
